resources.string: Hanī! Anata ga kono nagai jinsei kara yasumu saigo no beddo no fumoto de, watashi wa koko ni kite, anata ni nakama no kokoro o motarasu tame ni, mazushī shin\'ainaru hito ni narimasu. Sono shin no aijō wa kare ni myakudō shi, subete no ningen ga yoma reta ni mo kakawarazu, watashitachi no sonzai o hoshigari, sumi ni kare wa zen sekai o okimashita... Watashi wa anata ni hana o motarashimasu - watashitachi ga issho ni sugisari, ima watashitachi no naka de shinda no o miru chikyū kara hikisaka reta zangai. Ha to bunri; moshi watashi ga, moshi watashi ga aku no me de jōshiki-ka sa reta jinsei no kangae o motte irunara, soreha kiesari, ikita kangaeda to iu kotodesu.
